title: Gorgeous Vintage 3 bedroom with modern amenities
posting_body: Absolutely gorgeous and bright 2nd floor vintage Chicago apartment right at the border of Humbodlt and Ukrainian Village.
(Technically considered West Town)
This unit features central AC/heat, two full sized bedrooms, and one that could be a children’s room or office--perfect for a WFH set up.
Updated and huge kitchen with new flooring and kitchen pantry to be completed during the month of August.
Kitchen includes dishwasher, sink garbage disposal, granite countertops, and in unit laundry.
The entire bathroom will be redesigned and completed mid August with a new deep soaking tub, matte black fixtures, glass globe vanity light, and dark wood vanity/storage.
The whole unit will also be freshly painted (by professionals!)
with a fresh coat of Sherwin Williams snowfall white.
Not pictured is an additional sunroom with sliding doors to the back balcony (which could work as a bonus office as well.)
Backyard features a shared wood patio, charcoal grill, and fire pit.
Open to gardeners to move in and add to the garden set up!
There is plenty of street parking in the neighborhood.
Location is right off the Division street so easy access to the Division bus, and right in between the California and Western bus giving you quick access to Logan square and Wicker Park.
2 blocks from Humboldt Park and there is a new dog park directly across the street, making this a great option for *dog owners.
Very close to Empty Bottle & plenty of great UKV and Boriqua restaurants with a phenomenal mercado at the end of the block!
*Yes, we are open to dogs in the apartments, but we would like details on the dog’s behaviors, age, activity level, etc.
Since this is a 2nd floor unit, we want to be sure there won’t be too much sound traveling to the lower unit.
Cats should be no problem as long as they use a litter box consistently.
Lease and maintenance is hosted on Apartments.com, you will be submitting an application here.
https://www.apartments.com/apply-online/?provider=apts&l=7z5pw5w&u=827h9f1
I plan on hosting an open house for people to see it before the completed changes on August 6th and 7th, but open to serious inquires for earlier evening showings first week of August.
Lease will be from September 1st 2022 until August 1st 2023 (technically 11 months) --just a better time to end a lease if the renters would like to leave and I must find new occupants.
About the owner: Full time employment, working M-F 9-6pm from home.
Will be living in the downstairs unit, and is a great quiet neighbor.
This is their only property and they strive to give back to the Humbodlt park community as a new community member.
Additional details on pets & Deposit:
Pet move in fee:
$100 for cats
$300 for dogs
Deposit:
Move in:
Lease starts September 1st, early move in for August 22nd available.
